title: GridPP networking infrastructure (DRI) - QMUL Grant
abstractText: Equipment only, agreed in relation to the network infrastructure for robust and resilient computing and storage services for the LHC Grant (DRI -bid).
impactText: Other disciplines have used our Grid for their own purposes. Digital/Communication/Information Technologies (including Software),Education,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology Societal
findingsText: We have built a Grid to analyse data from the LHC at CERN and elsewhere. This enabled the discovery of the Higgs Boson, the fundamental scalar boson that is predicted to give mass to all other particles. Other disciplines can use our facilities or work with us to develop their own. Digital/Communication/Information Technologies (including Software)
